resources.string: "Some social networks want to be your stage manager: they put your life on display for audiences both intended (e.g. your friends, your family) and unintended (e.g. advertisers and misbehaving applications)."

"Footlights lets you choose how to present yourself to all of the audiences in your life. Share however much—or however little—you like, with anybody; this is your show. We've built the venue, but this is your production."
"All the world's a stage... it's time to express yourself."
